## Auswahl der Daten: Auswahl der relevanten Elemente und Merkmale {.justify}
```{r}
library(dagitty)
dag <- dagitty('dag {
  age -> gammopathy
  food -> cholesterol
  cholesterol -> gammopathy
  smoking -> gammopathy
  alcohol -> liver enzyme
  alcohol -> cholesterol
  gammopathy <- liver enzyme
  sex -> gammopathy
  GUS -> gammopathy
  age -> GUS
  
}')

plot(dag)

adjustmentSets(dag, exposure = "sex", outcome = "gammopathy")
```
